responses.s0_q0: Yes: The strategy is documented, covers all 12 NDP domains, and is reviewed/updated annually.
responses.s0_q1: Yes: A formal, dedicated unit or office is operational and has clear responsibilities.
responses.s0_q2: Yes: The policy is published, communicated, and aligned with NDP requirements.
responses.s0_q3: Yes: All roles and responsibilities are documented and assigned.
responses.s1_q0: Yes: A comprehensive architecture exists, is documented, and regularly updated.
responses.s1_q1: Yes: An EDM is in place, covering descriptive, diagnostic, predictive, and prescriptive analytics.
responses.s1_q2: Yes: All models are reviewed and approved by NPC.
responses.s2_q0: Yes: The policy is published and aligned with national standards.
responses.s2_q1: Yes: A formal program is in place, with regular assessments and improvements.
responses.s2_q2: Yes: Scorecards and KPIs are implemented and actively monitored.
responses.s3_q0: Yes: A formal, published policy exists and is aligned with national standards.
responses.s3_q1: Yes: A comprehensive MDM program and plan are operational.
responses.s3_q2: Partially: Some coordination/approval has occurred, but not comprehensively.
responses.s4_q0: Yes: Policy and program exist and cover the full lifecycle.
responses.s4_q1: Partially: Some digitalization efforts are underway, but not comprehensive.
responses.s5_q0: No: No catalog or metadata system exists.
responses.s5_q1: Partially: Some alignment exists, but not comprehensive.
responses.s6_q0: Yes: Policies are documented, compliant, and regularly reviewed.
responses.s6_q1: Yes: All storage solutions are secure, scalable, and compliant.
